TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Position extends DocumentFormat.OpenXml.Math.TopBottomType

summary.para: This class is available in Office 2007 or above.
When the object is serialized out as xml, it's qualified name is m:pos.

remarks.format:
## Remarks [!INCLUDE[openxmlnoticeiso](~/includes/openxmlnoticeiso.md)]
**pos (Position)**
This element specifies the position of the bar or group character in the parent object; the default is *bot*. Whether the element is absent or present without the val attribute, the default of the val attribute is *bot*. [*Example*: The XML representation for the mathematical overbar is:
```xml <m:bar> <m:barPr> <m:pos m:val="top"/> </m:barPr> <m:e> <m:r> <m:t>a</m: t> </ m:r> </m:e> </m:bar> ```
*end example*]
|Parent Elements| |---------------------| |barPr (§22.1.2.8); groupChrPr (§22.1.2.42)|
[*Note*: The W3C XML Schema definition of this element’s content model (CT_TopBot) is located in §A.6.1. *end note*]
[!INCLUDE[openxmlnoticeiso](~/includes/openxmlcopyrightiso.md)]
